translation.en: You're the new girl, right? Emily?
-It's Elodie. -Rachelle. Our dads work together.
I heard about your mom. That is so tragic.
translation.de: Ich hörte von deiner Mom. Tragisch. Alles ok?

translation.en: Are you okay? Wait. Is that a weird question to ask?
translation.de: Ich hörte von deiner Mom. Tragisch. Alles ok? Ist das eine blöde Frage? Klar ist nicht alles ok.

translation.en: Of course you're not okay.
translation.de: Ist das eine blöde Frage? Klar ist nicht alles ok.

translation.en: It's fine. I'm... fine.
You probably haven't heard, but there's this back-to-school blowout tonight.
translation.de: Hast du von der Schul-Fete heute Abend gehört?

translation.en: Want to come?
I'm not really into the whole party thing.
translation.de: Ich stehe nicht so auf Partys.

translation.en: And how's that working for you?
-Are we even invited? -It's a house party.
You don't get invited. You either go or don't go.
translation.de: Man wird nicht eingeladen. Du gehst hin oder nicht.

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure.
I'll pick you up at eight. And maybe go with the less grandfatherly vibe.
translation.de: Ich hole dich um acht ab. Trag nicht so einen Opa-Look.

translation.en: -[girl 1 scoffs] You're ridiculous. -[girl 2] What?
-I never get a good picture of my ass. -Oh, my heart breaks. [chuckles]
translation.de: -Ich kriege meinen Po nicht gut ins Bild. -Mir bricht das Herz.

translation.en: So, what's our timing for Ravi's tonight?
[girl 2] Ah, you tell me.
I heard he's bringing back the ice luge.
Oh, please, do not throw up again.
Can I help you?
Oh. Sorry, I was just...
Oh, my God, it's Kendall and Kylie.
Not the friendliest, are they?
[chanting] Drink, drink, drink! Drink, drink, drink, drink!
Way better than Albuquerque, am I right?
What's their deal?
[Rachelle] Who? Tabitha and Brady?
He's a senior and she's so pretty she's basically an avatar.
translation.de: Er ist älter, und sie so hübsch, im Grunde ein Avatar.

translation.en: It's like they knew they were the two hottest people in school and decided,
translation.de: Sie wissen, wie heiß sie sind und haben beschlossen:

translation.en: "Why not be cliché?"
[man] Noah, you're doing it all wrong. It's all in the flick of the wrist.
translation.de: Noah, du machst das falsch. Das Handgelenk muss schnellen.

translation.en: That's so myth. It's actually all in the tip...
translation.de: Blödsinn, es geht über die Spitze...

translation.en: ...of your finger.
Speaking of the genetically blessed, it is not right how hot Noah Simos is.
translation.de: Was die genetisch Bevorzugten angeht, wie heiß Noah Simon ist, ist unfair.

translation.en: Totally.
-[girl] Hi. -Hi.
Alas, my odds are better with Brian from Honors Chem.
translation.de: Meine Chancen stehen besser bei Brian von den Elite-Chemikern.

translation.en: I'm gonna go dazzle him with my wit.
translation.de: Ich betöre ihn mit meinem Witz.

translation.en: Try not to stand around looking all... murdery.
translation.de: Steh hier nicht herum wie eine Mörderin.

translation.en: [Brady] Look, why'd you even bother coming if you're gonna be such a bitch?
translation.de: Warum bist du gekommen, wenn du so zickig bist?

translation.en: [Tabitha] You're offensive.
-What? Come on. Let's go back inside. -Brady, I want to go.
translation.de: -Was? Komm. Gehen wir rein. -Brady, ich will gehen.

translation.en: You need to lighten up. All right? You used to be more fun.
translation.de: Entspann dich. Du warst früher lustiger.

translation.en: -You used to be less of a dick. -Hey.
Can you stop, Brady? You're hurting me.
translation.de: Hör auf, Brady. Das tut mir weh.

translation.en: -Brady, let go! -[Brady scoffs]
Fine. Be that way.
[Tabitha gasps] Shit!
Perfect.
Bro. We were down by so much in the half, and then you came back and you crushed it.
translation.de: Zur Halbzeit lagen wir so weit zurück, dann hast du es rumgerissen.

translation.en: Bro, it was like David and Goliath.
-That goalie was a beast. A literal beast. -Right?
-How you doing? -Hi.
So... you got a little something right there.
-Oh. -Hold on, let me get it. Hold on.
-[Elodie chuckles] -Yeah.
I won't tell anybody if you don't. All right?
Thanks.
All right. I'm gonna catch you around. Peace.
-[Rachelle] Wanna get out of here? -[Brian] What about your friend?
New girl? Honestly, I just brought her 'cause my dad asked me to be nice to her.
translation.de: Die Neue? Mein Vater sagte, ich soll nett zu ihr sein.

translation.en: Let's go.
[man] Gonna need you to put that down.
Come with me.
You fucking kidding me?
[man] We're here. Hey.
We're here.
Do I seriously have to do this?
I told you, it was just a misunderstanding.
translation.de: Ich sagte, es war ein Missverständnis.

translation.en: Come on, El. The security guard caught you red-handed.
translation.de: Komm, El. Der Wachmann hat dich erwischt.

translation.en: You're lucky they didn't press charges.
translation.de: Zum Glück gab es keine Anzeige.

translation.en: That's me, super lucky.
Well, I thought what happened back in Albuquerque was a one-time thing.
translation.de: Ich dachte, das in Albuquerque war eine einmalige Sache.

translation.en: My friend Suzanne says these kind of things have helped some of her patients.
translation.de: Meine Freundin Suzanne sagt, das hat einigen ihrer Patienten geholfen.

translation.en: [man] Jenna is right. You never know, it could be good for you.
translation.de: Jenna hat recht. Es könnte gut für dich sein.

translation.en: Whatever.
You're gonna miss my science fair.
Seems like your parents have other plans for me.
translation.de: Deine Eltern haben andere Pläne für mich.

translation.en: Look, if you want, I-- I could come back and leave early, pick you up.
translation.de: Schau... ...ich könnte eher zurückkommen und dich abholen.

translation.en: It's fine. I'll take the MAX.
translation.de: Schon gut. Ich nehme das MAX.

translation.en: [Jenna] We'll see you back home.
[woman] "God grant me the serenity to accept the things I cannot change,
translation.de: "Gott, gib mir die Ruhe, hinzunehmen, was ich nicht ändern kann,

translation.en: courage to change the things I can, and the wisdom to know the difference."
translation.de: den Mut, zu ändern, was ich kann, die Weisheit, den Unterschied zu sehen."

translation.en: Good afternoon, everyone.
I'm Shawn...
...and I'm a kleptomaniac. I'm four years shoplifting-free.
translation.de: ...und Kleptomanin. Ich klaue seit vier Jahren nicht.

translation.en: I'm also a codependent and the child of an alcoholic.
translation.de: Ich bin co-abhängig und Kind einer Alkoholikerin.

translation.en: [chuckles] And I've learned not to be defined by labels.
translation.de: Ich lasse mich nicht in Schubladen stecken.

translation.en: So, who would like to share today?
[Shawn] Great.
[Stella] Hi, I'm Stella.
[all] Hi, Stella.
It's been six months since I've lifted anything...
translation.de: Ich habe seit sechs Monaten nicht mehr geklaut...

translation.en: and it's not like I haven't been tempted.
I mean, there's a Petco on my corner.
translation.de: An meiner Ecke ist ein Petco.

translation.en: [Stella] I just keep telling myself, if I stick with the program,
translation.de: Ich sage mir, wenn ich mich an das Programm halte,

translation.en: I'll stay clean.
Hi, I'm Claire.
[all] Hi, Claire.
[Claire] Since that incident at work, I've... started taking stuff from the office.
translation.de: Seit dem Vorfall bei der Arbeit habe ich Dinge aus dem Büro entwendet.

translation.en: Uh, staplers, pens.
I know I need to stop.
But... it's like there's this hole that I keep trying to fill
translation.de: Aber... Es ist, als würde ich versuchen, mit all dem Bürokram ein Loch zu füllen.

translation.en: with all of these office supplies...
translation.de: Es ist, als würde ich versuchen, mit all dem Bürokram ein Loch zu füllen.

translation.en: -and it's, like, never enough, you know? -[door closes]
[Shawn] Thank you.
[Shawn] Hello there.
We've got a lot of new faces today.
Please... feel welcome to share if you're so inspired.
translation.de: Bitte. Teilt euch mit, wenn ihr wollt.

translation.en: Any of the other newcomers?
What about you in the back?
Me?
I... don't really feel like sharing, if that's okay.
translation.de: Ich möchte nichts teilen, wenn das ok ist.

translation.en: Of course.
But your shares are a valuable part of our collective journey.
translation.de: Aber Teilen ist ein wertvoller Beitrag unserer kollektiven Reise.

translation.en: I promise you, this is an incredibly safe space.
translation.de: Ich verspreche dir, das hier ist ein sicherer Ort.

translation.en: I don't really know what to say.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, was ich sagen soll.

translation.en: Why don't you tell us your name?
Hi, I'm Elodie.
[all] Hi, Elodie.
[Shawn] Do you want to tell us about the first time you stole?
translation.de: Erzähle uns von deinem ersten Diebstahl.

translation.en: Okay.
it was a couple months ago. It was kind of an accident. I...
translation.de: Das war vor ein paar Monaten. Es war eher Zufall. Ich...

translation.en: walked out of a hospital cafeteria with a pack of Starbursts I forgot to pay for.
translation.de: ...lief aus der Krankenhaus-Cafeteria ohne den Schokoriegel zu bezahlen.

translation.en: Once I realized, I knew I should have gone back, but...
translation.de: Ich hätte ihn zurückbringen können, aber...

translation.en: I kind of felt like I deserved it.
translation.de: Ich fand, er stehe mir zu.

translation.en: It's like...
there are forces that can randomly take people away. There should be...
translation.de: Wenn es Mächte gibt, die einen Leute wegnehmen, sollte es...

translation.en: forces that randomly give you things for free.
translation.de: ...Mächte geben, die einem was kostenlos geben.

translation.en: [Shawn] We are incredibly grateful for that share.
translation.de: Wir sind dankbar für deine Geschichte.

translation.en: Is that a Courtney Barnett pin?
-I love her music. -Yeah.
She did an after-party at this club where I work. She was chill.
translation.de: Ich sah sie bei einer After-Party in einem Club. Sie war cool.

translation.en: Did she play "Avant Gardener"?
Yeah, people went nuts.
You like long walks on the beach? I like long walks on the beach.
translation.de: Du stehst auf Spaziergänge am Strand und ich auch.

translation.en: -Moe, why are you always giving me shit? -With a face like that? Someone's got to.
translation.de: -Moe, warum verarschst du mich immer? -Es liegt an deinem Gesicht.

translation.en: She can't help herself.
You guys know each other?
-[Moe and Tabitha] No. -We go to the same school.
Right on. Luca.
And you are?
I know your type.
Is that so?
Let me guess. Some judge cut you a sweet deal.
translation.de: Lass mich raten. Ein Richter hat ein Auge zugedrückt.

translation.en: [Shawn] Shall we reconvene?
Drool much?
Just so we're clear, this never happened.
translation.de: Nur, dass das klar ist. Das hier ist nie passiert.

translation.en: Shocker.
-Oh, hey. I was just-- -Sure.
-So, where are you from? -New Mexico.
translation.de: Wo kommst du her? New Mexico.

translation.en: Ah. The land of meth heads and UFOs.
translation.de: Das Land der Meth-Süchtigen und Ufos.

translation.en: I hope you said goodbye to the sun. Forever.
translation.de: Verabschiede dich von der Sonne. Für immer.

translation.en: -That bad? -Yeah. And the people here suck, too.
translation.de: -So schlimm? -Und die Leute sind auch daneben.

translation.en: Everyone's obsessed with keeping Portland weird. It's oppressive.
translation.de: Jeder will, dass Portland schräg bleibt. Es ist beklemmend.

translation.en: -Life is oppressive. -That why you steal?
I just... need some concealer.
[Moe scoffs] Oh, hey. You better keep an eye on that one.
translation.de: Hey. Auf die muss man achten.

translation.en: Guess old habits die hard.
translation.de: Alte Gewohnheiten wird man schwer los.

translation.en: Look, I only showed up today
because my dad's lawyer convinced some judge
translation.de: weil der Anwalt den Richter überzeugte,

translation.en: that going there once a week would be my salvation.
translation.de: das eine Mal pro Woche wäre meine Rettung.

translation.en: From what? Your unlimited allowance?
Mommy's Pinterest palace? The holistic family chef?
-[whispers] Is he mean to you? -I'm not doing this with you.
translation.de: -Ist er gemein zu dir? -Ich spiele nicht mit.

translation.en: Fine. Just tell me what they got you for.
Bracelet. Got a little cocky. A hidden camera.
translation.de: Armband. Ich wurde übermütig. Versteckte Kamera.

translation.en: So what's your deal?
I... don't really feel comfortable talking about this here.
translation.de: Darüber möchte ich hier nicht reden.

translation.en: Fuck talking.
Let's see who can get the best shit in the shortest amount of time.
translation.de: Wer klaut in der kürzesten Zeit den besten Scheiß?

translation.en: Winner takes all.
And how do we account for taste?
Highest price tag wins.
Fine.
Meet in the park across the street in 30.
Looks like what's-her-name's a no-show.
Probably got nabbed. When will they ever learn?
translation.de: Wurde wohl geschnappt. Wann lernen sie nur?

translation.en: Whatever. Let's get this over with.
translation.de: Egal. Bringen wir es hinter uns.

translation.en: After you, Tabby.
-Don't call me that. -Right.
You like to pretend we didn't co-parent a Polly Pocket.
translation.de: Tu so, als waren wir nicht Eltern einer Polly Pocket.

translation.en: Look, I get that those may have been your glory days, but you can spare me the trip down memory lane.
translation.de: Das waren wohl deine besten Tage, aber lass die Erinnerungen ruhen.

translation.en: Whatever you say, Tabby.
Not bad.
Your turn.
-What the hell is this? -Spanx.
[chuckles] Were you even trying?
Yo, you're late and empty-handed.
Holy shit.
Yeah, right. Those are not real.
No, but they were $400.
And the winner is...
Well, I really don't think it's your style.
translation.de: Das Teil ist nicht dein Stil.

translation.en: Don't be a garbage human. We made a deal.
translation.de: Sei keine Mistbiene. Der Deal gilt.

translation.en: Give her the jacket.
No, she's right. It's not really me.
translation.de: Nein, sie hat recht. Das bin ich nicht.

translation.en: Moe, have you been kidnapped?
Yes. Send for help!
They're such losers.
Hey, Brady. Look, I'm stranded. Can you come and pick me up?
translation.de: Hey, Brady. Ich komme nicht weg. Kannst du mich abholen?

translation.en: Thanks. I'm dropping a pin.
Can you quit stalking me?
Sorry. It's just...
what happened with you and Brady at the party...
You don't know what you're talking about.
I just mean if you... ever need someone to talk to...
translation.de: Ich meine, wenn du mit jemandem reden möchtest...

translation.en: Unlike you, I have friends, so I'm good.
translation.de: Im Gegensatz zu dir habe ich Freunde. Alles perfekt.

translation.en: Hey, babe.
You look nice.
I got your favorite. Extra foam.
translation.de: Wie du ihn magst. Mit viel Schaum.

translation.en: Thanks.
[Doug] I know you said you weren't hungry.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hast gesagt, du bist nicht hungrig.

translation.en: -Ever hear of knocking? -Oh, sorry. I just brought you a sprout bowl.
translation.de: -Wie wäre es mit Anklopfen? -Sorry. Eine Schale Sprossen.

translation.en: Thanks.
Uh, look. I hope I wasn't too hard on you about this whole shoplifting thing.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, ich war wegen des Ladendiebstahls nicht zu streng.

translation.en: I mean, God knows, I pulled some stupid stunts at your age
translation.de: Ich habe in deinem Alter weiß Gott jede Menge Scheiß gebaut.

translation.en: and I hadn't gone through anything close to what you have.
translation.de: Und meine Kindheit war nicht so schwer.

translation.en: It's okay, Dad. We don't have to talk about it.
translation.de: Schon gut, Dad. Wir müssen nicht darüber reden.

translation.en: Don't worry, I will get this elliptical out of here.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, das Gerät kommt raus.

translation.en: I'm thinking of turning the garage into a home gym.
translation.de: Ich überlege, ob ich aus der Garage einen Sportraum mache.

translation.en: Since when are you into exercise?
Jenna got me into it. Feel like a new man.
translation.de: Jenna brachte mich drauf. Ich fühle mich wie neu.

translation.en: You know... I'm really glad you're here.
translation.de: Weißt du... es ist gut, dass du da bist.

translation.en: You can finally get to know Jenna and Spencer better.
translation.de: Du lernst Jenna und Spencer endlich besser kennen.

translation.en: I don't not know them.
Oh, I mean, more than Christmas every other year.
translation.de: Ich meinte, mehr als jedes zweite Jahr zu Weihnachten.

translation.en: Obviously, I wish it were...
under different circumstances-- I've got homework.
So...
Okay, kiddo.
Good night.
You said you'd never be back.
What up, Paula?
You know, same ol'.
-Usual? -Best blueberry pie in town.
translation.de: Das Übliche? Der beste Blaubeerkuchen der Stadt. Kriege ich Mitarbeiter-Rabatt?

translation.en: Employee discount still apply?
translation.de: Der beste Blaubeerkuchen der Stadt. Kriege ich Mitarbeiter-Rabatt?

translation.en: Real reunion in here tonight.
Hey, yo, Paula, I'll be right back.
translation.de: Paula, ich bin gleich wieder da.

translation.en: -Yes, yes! -There's no way!
You sure about this? The boys are right outside.
translation.de: Meinst du das ernst? Die Jungs sind draußen.

translation.en: How long before they miss you?
I don't know. Two, three minutes.
Works for me.
♪ So you want to know the distance ♪
♪ Between the drowning and the drifting ♪
Let's go, slore.
[Elodie] The first rule of shoplifting is to be invisible in plain sight.
translation.de: Die erste Regel beim Ladendiebstahl ist, bei freier Sicht unsichtbar zu sein.

translation.en: But... aren't we kind of doing that all the time?
translation.de: Aber... ...sind wir das nicht sowieso alle ständig?

translation.en: It's like we filter our lives to fit into other people's ideas
translation.de: Wir filtern unser Leben, um Vorstellungen anderer zu entsprechen.

translation.en: of who we're supposed to be.
Who we're supposed to date.
Or how we're supposed to deal with heartbreak.
translation.de: Wie wir mit gebrochenem Herzen umzugehen haben.

translation.en: [Elodie] But... what if you meet people who...
translation.de: Aber was, wenn du Leute triffst...

translation.en: without even trying, just... see you?
translation.de: ...die dich, ohne sich zu bemühen, einfach sehen?

translation.en: What if the people you least expect could turn out to be... your people...
translation.de: Was, wenn die, von denen du es am wenigsten erwartest, Freunde werden...

translation.en: if you let them?
